mail.mailSubject: Confirmation for booking !BOOKEDSLOTS slot(s) for the Event
mail.mailText:
Hello !FIRSTNAME, 

we confirm your booking. Here are the details:
* Name: !FIRSTNAME !LASTNAME
* E-Mail: !EMAIL
* Booked slots: !BOOKEDSLOTS
* Timeslot: !TIMESLOT
We hope you have a great time :)

Sincerely
the Astroteam
mail.editMailSubject: We have edited your booking for the event
mail.editMailText:
Hello !FIRSTNAME, 

we confirm an edit to your previous booking:
* Name: !FIRSTNAME !LASTNAME
* E-Mail: !EMAIL
* Booked slots: !BOOKEDSLOTS
* Timeslot: !TIMESLOT

Your new updated information:
* Name: !NEWFIRSTNAME !NEWLASTNAME
* E-Mail: !NEWEMAIL
* Booked slots: !NEWBOOKEDSLOTS
* Timeslot: !NEWTIMESLOT

Sincerely
the Astroteam
mail.deleteMailSubject: We have canceled your booking for the event
mail.deleteMailText:
Hello !FIRSTNAME, 

we removed the following booking:
* Name: !FIRSTNAME !LASTNAME
* E-Mail: !EMAIL
* Booked slots: !BOOKEDSLOTS
* Timeslot: !TIMESLOT

Sincerely
